question.q: An important thing to remember about Apps is:

option.value: All apps are available on all platforms, making it easy for customers
Apps are just mini-websites, and aren't very important to customers
Apps help personalize and customize a smartphone for the individual customer
Apps are generally pretty limited in features and functions.

question.q: The marketplace with the largest number of apps available (as of summer 2013) is:
Apps are limited to four categories: Entertainment, Games, Productivity, and Heath & Fitness.
A great way to showcase apps your customer might be interested in is to:

option.value: Talk to them about their interests, work, or hobbies
Be ready and knowledgable about apps for specific platforms
Bookmark the web sites for different app stores to demonstrate what's available
